text: @realDonaldTrump @MikeGarcia2020 @GavinNewsom 79,696 Americans dead, 1.34M confirmed sick with #COVID19 and you soulless cold heartless LYING about rigged elections. Funny coming from you, a thug who whole life is mafia way, cheat, steal, bribe, lie as you rigged 2016 elections.
